scene: Teen Byte sitting contentedly at the desk in evening light, reflecting on 4 commits of coding progress today

subjects.description: Teen-stage Byte with gangly proportions, longer limbs, slightly awkward posture, soft teal-blue pixel art form, gentle content expression, big expressive eyes open and relaxed
subjects.position: center foreground, sitting at the desk facing the oversized laptop
subjects.action: sitting comfortably with a calm, content posture, small smile, paws resting near the laptop keyboard

style: pixel art, clean 2D forms, dithered shading, readable silhouette, consistent teen proportions
lighting: evening indoor light with warm desk lamp glow, soft purple-pink sky visible through window, gentle shadows
mood: content and peaceful, relaxed after productive coding
background: room interior with wooden desk, trophy shelf above with single golden 10-day streak trophy, succulent plant on left side of desk, food bowl with kibble partially visible
composition: centered framing, Byte as primary focus, laptop screen facing Byte, skyline window providing depth
